# VisQuanta

> VisQuanta is an AI-powered revenue operating system for automotive dealerships in the United States. The company provides lead reactivation, speed-to-lead response, reputation management, and service department automation through its flagship platform, AutoMaster Suite.

## Important Notes

- VisQuanta serves car dealerships exclusively in the United States
- AutoMaster Suite is an all-in-one AI platformâ€”not a single-feature tool
- The company is headquartered in Miami, Florida
- All services operate on month-to-month contracts with no long-term commitment required
- Implementation takes 14 business days with a dedicated Dealer Success Manager
- VisQuanta integrates with all major DMS and CRM platforms used by dealerships
- The platform is TCPA-compliant for all SMS and voice communications
- VisQuanta is BBB accredited

## Core Products

- [AutoMaster Suite](https://visquanta.com/auto-master-suite): The complete AI platform for dealership sales and service automation. Includes dashboard, real-time conversation monitoring, and all five core capabilities.
- [Lead Reactivation (LLM)](https://visquanta.com/lead-reactivation): Conversational AI that systematically reactivates dormant CRM leads into booked sales appointments. Achieves 30%+ re-engagement rate and 11%+ revenue increase.
- [Speed to Lead](https://visquanta.com/speed-to-lead): Sub-60-second AI response to all inbound leads via SMS. 21x higher conversion rate than traditional BDC response times.
- [Website Widget](https://visquanta.com/website-widget): SMS-first web chat that captures real phone numbers and continues conversations beyond the browser session. 98% open rate.
- [Reputation Management (ARM)](https://visquanta.com/reputation-management): Automated review request system that detects happy customers post-purchase and intercepts negative feedback before it goes public.
- [Service Drive Pro](https://visquanta.com/service-drive): Voice AI for inbound service department calls. Handles appointment booking, recall reminders, and maintenance scheduling with zero missed calls.

## Dealer Types Served

- [Independent Dealers](https://visquanta.com/dealers/independent): Enterprise-grade AI for independent used car dealerships without the overhead or complexity.
- [Franchise Dealers](https://visquanta.com/dealers/franchise): OEM-compliant solutions optimized for manufacturer requirements and CSI score improvement.
- [Auto Groups](https://visquanta.com/dealers/auto-groups): Multi-rooftop deployment with unified dashboard, centralized reporting, and consistent processes across all locations.
- [Pre-Owned Dealers](https://visquanta.com/dealers/pre-owned): Specialized solutions for high-turn pre-owned inventory operations.

## Platform Integrations

### DMS (Dealer Management Systems)
- CDK Global
- Dealertrack
- Titan DMS
- Frazer

### CRM Platforms
- VinSolutions
- DealerSocket
- eLead
- DriveCentric

### Lead Sources
- Compatible with 100+ lead sources including OEM leads, third-party providers, and website forms

## Key Statistics

- $37.8M+ additional revenue generated for dealership partners
- 7,192+ vehicles sold from reactivated leads
- 11.6% average lift in vehicles sold
- 98% dealer satisfaction rating
- <60 second response time to inbound leads
- 24/7/365 coverage including nights, weekends, and holidays
